name: Tilray, Inc.
description: Tilray, Inc. is a leading global cannabis-lifestyle and consumer packaged goods company that offers a diverse portfolio of products. Founded in 2013 and headquartered in Nanaimo, British Columbia, Tilray is known for its commitment to quality and innovation in the cannabis sector. The company was one of the first to receive a license to produce medical cannabis in Canada and has since expanded its operations globally, focusing on both medical and adult-use recreational cannabis markets. Tilray’s product offerings include dried cannabis, oils, capsules, and edibles, catering to a wide range of consumer needs and preferences. The company also emphasizes research and development, partnering with various organizations to advance cannabis science and education. With a strong presence in North America and Europe, Tilray aims to redefine the cannabis industry through sustainable practices and community engagement. The company’s mission is to provide safe and effective cannabis products to consumers while championing the benefits of cannabis in health and wellness.
